app.title: Calculate your University
app.description: Upload your university transcript and get your courses and average grade calculated in seconds.

calculator.title: GPA Calculator
calculator.emptyState: Add courses to calculate your GPA
calculator.processingDescription: This may take a moment while we analyze your image and extract the grades
calculator.supportedLanguages: Supports both Norwegian and English transcripts with passed courses

calculator.fetchLimitError: Failed to fetch upload limit status.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We encountered an error while processing your request. You can try again or contact us if the problem persists.

gradeDisplay.detailsDescription: Here is a detailed overview of your courses and grades.

features.title: How It Works
features.description: Unigpacalc makes it easy and intuitive to calculate your grade point average

feature1.title: Upload Transcript
feature1.description: Drag and drop your university/college transcript in image format.

feature2.title: Instant Analysis
feature2.description: Our AI technology extracts your grades and calculates the average immediately.

feature3.title: View Results
feature3.description: See your courses, credits, and grade point average in a clear table.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Fill out the form below to get in touch with us.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
form.messageShort: Message must be at least 10 characters
form.successDescription: We have received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorDescription: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again later.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using UniGPACalc, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: UniGPACalc provides a web-based GPA calculation service that allows users to calculate their grade point average based on the Norwegian grading system. The service includes manual grade entry and transcript image processing.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: When using our service, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate information when using the calculator
Not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Not attempt to interfere with or disrupt the service or its servers
Not try to access data that is not intended for you

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality on UniGPACalc, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, and software, are owned by or licensed to us and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy of GPA calculations and recommend that users verify results through their educational institution.

limitation.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall UniGPACalc or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. If we make changes, we will provide notice by updating the date at the top of these terms. Your continued use of the service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us through our contact form.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to UniGPACalc. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

dataCollection.title: 2. The Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: When you use our GPA calculator, we may collect the following types of information:
items: Course names and grades you enter manually
Transcript images you upload for processing

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your data in the following ways:
items: To provide the GPA calculation service
To improve our algorithms and text recognition
To analyze usage patterns and improve our service

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data against accidental loss, unauthorized access, or processing. Your transcript data is processed on our secure servers and is not shared with third parties.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including:
items: The right to request access to your personal data
The right to request correction of your personal data
The right to request erasure of your personal data

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us through our contact form.

AuthModal.title: Login or Sign Up
AuthModal.termsAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
